## Translation file for Resource View/Edit (RVE) ##Go to Global Class for History and Compare trans. ## This translation file replaces GWT. ## If you are adding a tooltip that uses JS, such as the iBall, you cannot use double quotes or apostrophes. Use this instead " = " and ' = ' ## If you are entering trans for a JS dialog that is not styled, you should not use special tags for quotation marks. ##TRANS PAGE CONTENT: ## TOC IN RVE******************************************* rve.toc.title=Table of Contents ## RESOURCE TITLE AREA******************************************* rve.title.function.favorite=?????????
